attributes.action: Make cannabis legal to grow for personal usage
attributes.additional_details: Growing it would allow the user to know exactly whats in there
attributes.background: What i would like to do is for the government or parliament to legalise the use of growing the plant as its only a herb with medical benefits, if we can learn and understand it better it can be used to the greatest ability

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions instead:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300201
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300475
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318654
